#include<iostream>
using namespace std;
 
int main()
{
	int t;
	cin>>t;
	while(t--)
	{
		int d,y;
		string x;
		cin>>x;
		cin>>d;
		y=x.length();
		for(int i = d-1; i < y; i++) 
			cout<<x[i];
		if((y-d+1)%2)
			for(int i = d-2 ; i >=0 ; i--) 
			cout<<x[i];
		else
			for (int i = 0; i < d-1; i++) cout<<x[i];
		cout<<endl;
	}
}
